tool_description: StockAPI - tool, that allows you to fetch all possible data about certain stock
name: StockAPI
title: StockAPI

api_list.name: Cash Flow Statement History
api_list.description: Retrieve 3 years prior last year yearly cash flow statement information
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stockapi17.p.rapidapi.com/tickers/AAPL/cash-flow/history"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stockapi17.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stockapi17.p.rapidapi.com/tickers/{ticker}/cash-flow/history"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stockapi17.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
